articles.description: Aashish Mehrotra quit Rupali Ganguly starrer Anupamaa. He spoke about his last day on the sets and revealed how he cried.
articles.content: Rupali Ganguly and Gaurav Khanna starrer Anupamaa is getting all the attention. The show has been on the top of the TRP charts. Yesterday, we all got a shocking news when Aashish Mehrotra announced h… [+2206 chars]

articles.title: Star Hero Trolled: Rashmika Is The Reason - M9
articles.description: Social media platforms were flooded with jokes and memes, with many finding the pairing of Salman Khan and Rashmika quite unusual.
articles.content:
Rashmika Mandanna will star alongside Salman Khan in the movie “Sikandar,” directed by AR Murugadoss. It’s set to release on Eid 2025.
Rashmika herself confirmed the news on social media, expressing… [+1330 chars]

articles.title: Idols' MET Gala Attendance Points To The "Problem" With K-Pop - Koreaboo
articles.description: BLACKPINK Jennie and Stray Kids' appearances at the "2024 MET Gala," triggered discussions over an ongoing "problem" in K-Pop.
articles.content: On May 6, the 2024 MET Gala took place, with dozens of worldwide stars in attendance. The event is a themed party meant to celebrate the featured exhibition, with this year’s being Sleeping Beauties:… [+3531 chars]
